org.softlang.megal.mi2

Class KB

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.softlang.megal.mi2.KB
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MegamodelKB, MutableKB

    public abstract class KB
extends java.lang.Object

    Class of knowledge bases on entity and typed relationships.

    Author:
    Pazuzu

    • Field Detail

      • ENTITY

        public static final java.lang.String ENTITY

        This is the name of the top level entity. This entity has itself as a supertype. A KB is invalid, if it assigns a new type to this name.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public RelationshipType getRelationshipType(java.lang.String name,
                                            java.lang.String left,
                                            boolean leftMany,
                                            java.lang.String right,
                                            boolean rightMany)

        Gets the relationship type for the name. Uses empty parameters.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the relationship type
        left - The definition of the left side
        leftMany - True if left is many
        right - The definition of the right side
        rightMany - True if right is many
        Returns:
        Returns the relationship type
